response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Our team has meticulously designed this solution to provide unparalleled benefits and efficiency. Considering its exceptional quality and the time we've invested into its development, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.", "product_price": 15000}
